titleStmt.title: A caveat for subjects, moderating the Observator. Wherein his chiefest arguments are confuted, the Kings iust prerogative manitained [sic]: and the priviledge of the subiect no wayes preiudiced: by William Ball, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Ball, William.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Parker, Henry. Observations upon some of his Majesties late answers and expresses.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
